title: Google\Cloud\Domains\V1alpha2\DnsSettings\GoogleDomainsDns
name: GoogleDomainsDns
description:
Configuration for using the free DNS zone provided by Google Domains as a Registration's dns_provider. You cannot configure the DNS zone itself using the API. To configure the DNS zone, go to Google Domains.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.domains.v1alpha2.DnsSettings.GoogleDomainsDns

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name_servers
params.description: Output only. A list of name servers that store the DNS zone for this domain. Each name server is a domain name, with Unicode domain names expressed in Punycode format. This field is automatically populated with the name servers assigned to the Google Domains DNS zone.

params.name: data.ds_state
params.description: Required. The state of DS records for this domain. Used to enable or disable automatic DNSSEC.

params.name: data.ds_records
params.description: Output only. The list of DS records published for this domain. The list is automatically populated when ds_state is DS_RECORDS_PUBLISHED, otherwise it remains empty.

methods.description:
